paypal.payflow

Class BaseTender

  • java.lang.Object
    • paypal.payflow.BaseTender
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ACHTender, CardTender, CheckTender, PayPalTender

    public class BaseTender
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class serves as base class of all tender objects. Each tender type is associated with a Payment Device. Following are the Payment Devices associated with different tender types: Tender Type Payment Device Data Object ACHTender BankAcct CardTender CreditCard
    PurchaseCard
    SwipeCard CheckTender CheckPayment

    • Method Detail

      • getChkNum

        public java.lang.String getChkNum()
        Gets the checkNumber.

        For ACH - The check serial number. Required for POP, ARC, and RCK. For TeleCheck - Account holder’s next unused (available) check number.

        Returns:
        chkNum String

      • setChkNum

        public void setChkNum(java.lang.String chkNum)
        Sets the check Number.

        For ACH - The check serial number. Required for POP, ARC, and RCK. For TeleCheck - Account holder’s next unused (available) check number.

        Parameters:
        chkNum - String
